favourite.article: Hallelujah! He is the first and the last. Everything is within His control. There is no one before Him and after Him. May we enjoy Him day by day, the Rock of ages.
I really enjoy this song. 'No more fear for changes, whatever change there is in our lives as long as we have Christ, the Rock of Ages! Oh Lord Jesus! We love You!!

Our unchanging Christ is changing us! He is before all things, and all things have Him as the goal (Col. 1:17,16; Eph. 1:10). God has given Him the first place in all things of the first creation and of the new creation (Col. 1:18). When we come in contact with the preeminent Christ, a good work begins in us which He will complete for God's good pleasure (Phil. 1:7; 2:13)! He is the first and the last of God's good pleasure, and He is the first and the last in our revelation, experience and service!
